fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.hairdryer

Class CVMUnitTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.hairdryer.CVMUnitTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class CVMUnitTest
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
    The class CVMUnitTest performs unit tests on the hair dryer component.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-09-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double ACCELERATION_FACTOR
      for real time simulations, the acceleration factor applied to the the simulated time to get the execution time of the simulations.
      static java.lang.String CLOCK_URI
      for unit tests and SIL simulation unit tests, a Clock is used to get a time-triggered synchronisation of the actions of the components in the test scenarios.
      static long DELAY_TO_START
      delay before starting the test scenarios, leaving time to build and initialise the components and their simulators; this delay is estimated given the complexity of the initialisation (including the creation of the application simulator if simulation is used).
      static long END_SLEEP_DURATION
      duration of the sleep at the end of the execution before exiting the JVM.
      static long EXECUTION_DURATION
      duration of the execution.
      static fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.ExecutionMode HAIR_DRYER_EXECUTION_MODE
      the execution mode for the hair dryer component, to select among the values of the enumeration ExecutionMode.

      the execution mode for the hair dryer tester component, to select among the values of the enumeration ExecutionMode.

      duration of the simulation, in simulated time.
      static fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.time.Time SIMULATION_START_TIME
      start time of the simulation, in simulated logical time, if relevant.
      static java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit SIMULATION_TIME_UNIT
      time unit in which SIMULATION_DURATION is expressed.
      static java.lang.String START_INSTANT
      start instant in test scenarios, as a string to be parsed.

    • Field Detail

      • DELAY_TO_START

        public static long DELAY_TO_START
        delay before starting the test scenarios, leaving time to build and initialise the components and their simulators; this delay is estimated given the complexity of the initialisation (including the creation of the application simulator if simulation is used). It could need to be revised if the computer on which the application is run is less powerful.

      • END_SLEEP_DURATION

        public static long END_SLEEP_DURATION
        duration of the sleep at the end of the execution before exiting the JVM.

      • SIMULATION_TIME_UNIT

        public static java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit SIMULATION_TIME_UNIT
        time unit in which SIMULATION_DURATION is expressed.

      • SIMULATION_START_TIME

        start time of the simulation, in simulated logical time, if relevant.

        duration of the simulation, in simulated time.

      • unitTestScenario

        public static fr.sorbonne_u.components.utils.tests.TestScenario unitTestScenario()
                                                                          throws fr.sorbonne_u.exceptions.VerboseException
        return a test scenario without simulation for testing the hair dryer component.

        Description

        The test includes four steps to be executed by the hair dryer unit tester component: switching on the hair dryer, setting it in high mode, setting it in low mode and then switching it off.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    return != null
        Returns:
        a test scenario for the unit testing of the hair dryer component.
        Throws:
        fr.sorbonne_u.exceptions.VerboseException - to do.

        public static fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.utils.tests.TestScenarioWithSimulation unitTestScenarioWithSimulation()
                                                                                                            throws fr.sorbonne_u.exceptions.VerboseException
        return a test scenario for testing with SIL simulation the hair dryer component.

        Description

        The test includes four steps to be executed by the hair dryer unit tester component: switching on the hair dryer, setting it in high mode, setting it in low mode and then switching it off.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    return != null
        Returns:
        a test scenario for the unit testing of the hair dryer component.
        Throws:
        fr.sorbonne_u.exceptions.VerboseException - to do.
